mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend_post (user_id, title, description, images) VALUES (#{userID}, #{title}, #{description}, #{imagesJSON})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, title, description, images, updated_at, COALESCE(user.avatar, 1) as userAvatar, COALESCE(user.nickname, "微信用户") as userNickname FROM friend_post LEFT JOIN user ON friend_post.user_id = user.userID WHERE id > #{offset} ORDER BY id LIMIT #{limit}
